metadata.title: Title: Orthogonal genome-wide screenings in bat cells identify MTHFD1 as a target of 1 broad antiviral therapy 2 3

abstract.original_text: bioRxiv preprint TATA box, CCAAT box, GC box and DNA stability are shown. Blue and red boxes indicate positions of those putative elements and related transcription factors predicted by GPMiner. A lack of CCAAT box was observed in both bats.

GC box and DNA stability are shown .
Blue and red boxes indicate positions of those putative elements and related transcription factors predicted by GPMiner .
A lack of CCAAT box was observed in both bats .
